    • selectEnquiry

      public Enquiry selectEnquiry(Applicant applicant)
      Helper method to allow the applicant to select an enquiry by index.
      Specified by:
      selectEnquiry in interface IApplicantEnquiryService
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant selecting an enquiry.
      Returns:
      The selected Enquiry, or null if the selection is invalid or no enquiries are available.
